Dispute_Type: Ownership of copyright in cigar designs
Legal_Issue: Whether Havana House can claim copyright without a written assignment
Procedural_Stage: Pre-trial motion to strike out or request for particulars
Evidence_Assessment: Havana House failed to produce written assignments, raising substantial doubt
Decision_Outcome: Claim not struck out; requirement to provide particulars within 15 days
Burden_of_Proof: On Havana House to substantiate copyright ownership
Credibility_Factor: Lack of documentary evidence (written assignment) affects credibility of claim
Legal_Rule: Assignment of copyright must be in writing and signed by the owner or agent
Standard_of_Review: Substantial doubt standard applied to validity of claim
Procedural_Issue: Defendants' motion to strike out or for particulars
Grounds_for_Claim: Havana House's assertion of copyright over Montecristo Habanas and Partagas cigar designs
Outcome_on_Merits: Not decided on merits yet; procedural step requiring further particulars
Judicial_Review_Outcome: Motion partially granted: Havana House must provide details
Review_Standard: Legal sufficiency of pleadings and compliance with statutory requirements
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Parties allowed cross-examination of deponents; costs shared equally
Legal_Framework: Copyright Act framework on assignment of rights
Applicant_Challenge: Defendants challenged the validity of the copyright claim
Court_Result: Order for Havana House to provide particulars; cross-examinations permitted
Standard_of_Proof: Balance of probabilities (implied in civil copyright claims)
Defendant_Response: Moved to strike out or request particulars based on lack of written assignment
Remedy_Requested: Striking out of Statement of Claim or request for particulars
Outcome: Havana House must provide detailed particulars of copyright acquisition
Remedy_Sought: Clarification and substantiation of copyright ownership claim
Resolution_Mechanism: Court order for further particulars and procedural directions
Claimant_Status: Havana House as claimant asserting copyright ownership
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Failure to comply with written assignment requirement
Outcome_of_Review: Request for particulars granted; claim not dismissed
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Provision of particulars by Havana House within 15 days
Jurisdiction: Relevant national or territorial jurisdiction under the Copyright Act
Governing_Rule: Written assignment required for valid copyright transfer
